name: Aeromania
about: Aeromania, based in Cheyenne, Wyoming, is a specialized flight school focusing on new jet type ratings and recurrent training, particularly in Cessna Citation models. Founded by Anthony Cirincione, a veteran of the Air Force and Flight Safety International, Aeromania offers in-aircraft training, emphasizing real-world experience and high-quality instruction. Every instructor is also an A&P IA, ensuring deep systems knowledge and practical expertise. The school prioritizes preflight and post-flight briefings, and tailors training to meet the unique needs of each client, often high-net-worth individuals or experienced jet pilots. Aeromania's commitment to quality and client satisfaction sets it apart in the aviation training industry.
